explains: n. 理想主义；唯心主义，唯心论

sentences.en: He was full of youthful idealism.
sentences.cn: 他满脑子都是年轻人的理想主义。

sentences.en: She never lost her respect for the idealism of the 1960s.
sentences.cn: 她从未摈弃自己对20世纪60年代理想主义的崇敬。

sentences.en: They struggled to keep the torch of idealism and hope alive.
sentences.cn: 他们为使理想主义和希望的火炬不熄灭而奋斗。
